verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G1299>giving<s%> <S%G1299>instructions<s%> to His <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> He <S%G3327>departed<s%> from <S%G1564>there<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> and <S%G2784>preach<s%> in their <S%G4172>cities.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2491>John<s%> in <S%G1201>prison<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> [word] by his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>
and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Are You the <S%G2064>Expected<s%> One, <S%G2228>or<s%> shall we <S%G4328>look<s%> for <S%G2087>someone<s%> <S%G2087>else<s%>?"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G518>report<s%> to <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> and see: <S%G991><s%>

[the] <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G308>receive<s%> <S%G308>sight<s%> and [the] <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> [the] <S%G3015>lepers<s%> are <S%G2511>cleansed<s%> and [the] <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> and [the] <S%G3498>dead<s%> are <S%G1453>raised<s%> up, and [the] <S%G4434>poor<s%> have the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> to them.
" And <S%G3107>blessed<s%> is he <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3361>keeps<s%> from <S%G4624>stumbling<s%> <S%G1722>over<s%> Me."

And as <S%G3778>these<s%> were <S%G4198>going<s%> [away,] <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> did you <S%G1831>go<s%> out into the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to <S%G2300>look<s%> at? A <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> by the <S%G417>wind<s%>?

"But <S%G5101>what<s%> did you <S%G1831>go<s%> out to <S%G3708>see<s%>? A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G294>dressed<s%> in <S%G3120>soft<s%> [clothing]? <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5409>wear<s%> <S%G3120>soft<s%> [clothing] are in kings' <S%G3624>palaces.<s%>

"But <S%G5101>why<s%> did you <S%G1831>go<s%> out? To <S%G3708>see<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet<s%>? <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, and one who is <S%G4053>more<s%> than a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the one <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> My <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> Your <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>Who<s%> will <S%G2680>prepare<s%> Your <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> You.'

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1722>among<s%> those <S%G1084>born<s%> of <S%G1135>women<s%> there has not <S%G1453>arisen<s%> [anyone] <S%G3173>greater<s%> than <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> he who is <S%G3398>least<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3173>greater<s%> than he.

"And from the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G971>suffers<s%> <S%G971>violence,<s%> and <S%G973>violent<s%> <S%G973>men<s%> <S%G726>take<s%> it by <S%G726>force.<s%>
"For <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G2491>John.<s%>
"And <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2309>care<s%> to <S%G1209>accept<s%> [it,] he <S%G846>himself<s%> is <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%> who was to <S%G2064>come.<s%>
"He who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>

"But to <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G3666>compare<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%>? It is <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G3813>children<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>places,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4377>call<s%> out to the <S%G2087>other<s%> [children],
and <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'We <S%G832>played<s%> the <S%G832>flute<s%> for you, and you did not <S%G3738>dance;<s%> we <S%G2354>sang<s%> a <S%G2354>dirge,<s%> and you did not <S%G2875>mourn.<s%>'
"For <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> and they <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'He <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1140>demon!<s%>'

"The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> and they <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> a <S%G5314>gluttonous<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> and a <S%G3630>drunkard,<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of tax-gatherers and <S%G268>sinners!<s%>' <S%G2532>Yet<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is <S%G1344>vindicated<s%> by her <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3679>reproach<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4183>most<s%> of His <S%G1411>miracles<s%> were <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they did not <S%G3340>repent.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G5523>Chorazin!<s%> <S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G966>Bethsaida!<s%> For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1411>miracles<s%> had <S%G1096>occurred<s%> in <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> which <S%G1096>occurred<s%> in you, they would have <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3819>long<s%> <S%G3819>ago<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> and <S%G4700>ashes.<s%>

<S%G4133>"Nevertheless<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, it shall be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> in [the] <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you.

"And you, <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> will not be <S%G5312>exalted<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> will you? You shall <S%G2597>descend<s%> to <S%G86>Hades;<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1411>miracles<s%> had <S%G1096>occurred<s%> in <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> which <S%G1096>occurred<s%> in you, it would have <S%G3306>remained<s%> to <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day.<s%>

<S%G4133>"Nevertheless<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that it shall be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> in [the] <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you."

At that <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1843>praise<s%> Thee, O <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> that Thou didst <S%G2928>hide<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> from [the] <S%G4680>wise<s%> and <S%G4908>intelligent<s%> and didst <S%G601>reveal<s%> them to babes. <S%G3516><s%>
<S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> for <S%G3779>thus<s%> it was well-pleasing in Thy <S%G1715>sight.<s%>

<S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> have been <S%G3860>handed<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> to Me by My <S%G3962>Father;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1921>knows<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> does <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and anyone to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1014>wills<s%> to <S%G601>reveal<s%> [Him.]
<S%G1205>"Come<s%> to Me, <S%G3956>all<s%> who are <S%G2872>weary<s%> and heavy-laden, and I will <S%G373>give<s%> you <S%G373>rest.<s%>

<S%G142>"Take<s%> My <S%G2218>yoke<s%> upon you, and <S%G3129>learn<s%> from Me, for I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4239>gentle<s%> and <S%G5011>humble<s%> in <S%G2588>heart;<s%> and you shall <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> for your <S%G5590>souls.<s%>
"For My <S%G2218>yoke<s%> is <S%G5543>easy,<s%> and My <S%G5413>load<s%> is <S%G1645>light.<s%>"
